scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel src/__dev__.html --out-dir dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build --no-source-maps src/*.njk --out-dir build/ --public-url . --no-minify
scripts.deploy-test: npm run deploy-prep && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: Test" -t
scripts.deploy-ci: npm run deploy-prep && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: ${CIRCLE_SHA1}" -t
